title_teim: The twenty-second annual induction ceremony. 2007. Line Cut Clean Reel #100 Tape 1 of 2, 3/12/07
title_ssm: The twenty-second annual induction ceremony. 2007. Line Cut Clean Reel #100 Tape 1 of 2, 3/12/07
title_si: The twenty-second annual induction ceremony. 2007. Line Cut Clean Reel #100 Tape 1 of 2, 3/12/07
alternative_title_teim: 22nd annual induction ceremony. Line Cut Clean Reel #100 Tape 1 of 2, 3/12/07
alternative_title_ssm: 22nd annual induction ceremony. Line Cut Clean Reel #100 Tape 1 of 2, 3/12/07
summary_teim: Edited packages intercutting acceptance speeches and performances of the 2007 annual induction of R.E.M., and a memorial to James Brown.
summary_ssm: Edited packages intercutting acceptance speeches and performances of the 2007 annual induction of R.E.M., and a memorial to James Brown.
contents_teim: Eddie Vedder inducts R.E.M. -- Montage of R.E.M accepting award and performing – Michael Stipe accepts award -- R.E.M. performs Gardening at night – R.E.M. performs Man on the moon with Eddie Vedder --Reverend Al Sharpton memorializes James Brown -- Montage of James Brown performances --All inductees and presenters perform Patti Smith’s People have the power
contents_ssm: Eddie Vedder inducts R.E.M. -- Montage of R.E.M accepting award and performing – Michael Stipe accepts award -- R.E.M. performs Gardening at night – R.E.M. performs Man on the moon with Eddie Vedder --Reverend Al Sharpton memorializes James Brown -- Montage of James Brown performances --All inductees and presenters perform Patti Smith’s People have the power
series_teim: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
series_ssm: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)

collection_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation Records
collection_authority_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
archival_series_authority_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
abstract_ssm: At 2007 Induction Ceremony -- Last part of Eddie Vedder inducting R.E.M. -- Members of R.E.M. accept their awards -- Mike Mills Speaks -- Begin the Begin (R.E.M.) -- Michael Stripe speaks -- Gardening at Night (R.E.M.) -- Man On the Moon (R.E.M. with Eddie Vedder) -- Rev. Al Sharpton honors James Brown (mixed with video montage of James Brown) -- People have the Power (Patti Smith, Aretha Franklin, R.E.M., Ronnie Spector, Keith Richards,, Paul Shaffer, Eddie Vedder, Grandmaster Flash, Sammy Hagar and Stephen Stills) -- end credits
